ai-pli-tv-pvr11:38.8_0: And can we completely dissect them so as to describe the difference between them?
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:39.2_0: these things are mixed, not separate.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:39.3_0: And you can never completely dissect them so as to describe the difference between them.

ai-pli-tv-pvr11:40.6_0: What is the source of further penalty?

ai-pli-tv-pvr11:41.1_0: the source of giving up of resolution face-to-face, sourced in sitting and sourced in the facet of view.

ai-pli-tv-pvr11:43.6_0: That cause is the reason why the source, origin, birthplace, and inception of causes and conditions for the sake of producing condition.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:43.7_0: Craving is the cause, source, origin, and condition of grass.

ai-pli-tv-pvr11:44.4_0: acting according to what has been admitted ...

ai-pli-tv-pvr11:44.8_0: In the presence of the others is produced in the presence of the original condition for arising. Rose-Apple Island is the condition for producing condition.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:44.11_0: At the time of lighting up the original activity. The arising of producing conditional origination is produced in condition.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:44.13_0: At the end of the arising of further penalty, the origin of opposite sex.

ai-pli-tv-pvr11:45.2_0: At the foot of the seven (story)s the thirty-six positions
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:45.3_0: What seven roots are the roots of going out?

ai-pli-tv-pvr11:48.1_0: A legal issue arising from a dispute is a dispute, not a legal issue. Are there legal issues that are not a dispute? Are there legal issues that are not a dispute? Are there legal issues that are also a dispute?
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:48.2_0: There may be disputes that are a legal issue arising from a dispute; there may be disputes that are not a legal issue; there may legal issues that are not a dispute; there may be legal issues that are also a dispute.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:49.1_0: How is there a dispute that is a legal issue arising from a dispute?
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:49.2_0: It’s when the monks are disputing: ‘This is the Teaching, the Teaching, or the Sangha.’
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:49.3_0: ‘This is a grave offense’, or ‘This is a minor offense.’
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:49.4_0: In regard to this, whatever quarreling, arguing, conflict, disputing, variety in opinion, difference in opinion, heated speech, or strife there is—
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:49.5_0: this is a dispute that is a legal issue arising from a dispute.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:50.1_0: How is there a dispute that is not a legal issue?
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:50.2_0: A mother disputes with her child; a child with their mother; a father with his child; a child with their father; a brother with his sister; a sister with her brother; a friend with their friend—
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:50.3_0: this is a dispute that is not a legal issue.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:51.1_0: How is there a legal issue that is not a dispute?
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:51.2_0: A legal issue arising from an accusation, a legal issue arising from an offense, a legal issue arising from business—
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:51.3_0: this is a legal issue that is not a dispute.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:52.1_0: How is there a legal issue that is also a dispute?
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:52.2_0: A legal issue arising from a dispute is a legal issue and also a dispute.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:53.1_0: (4b) Are there accusations that are a legal issue arising from an accusation? Are there accusations that are not a legal issue? Are there legal issues that are not an accusation? Are there legal issues that are also an accusation?
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:53.2_0: There may be accusations that are a legal issue arising from an accusation; there may be accusations that are not a legal issue; there may be legal issues that are not an accusation; there may legal issues that are also an accusation.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:54.1_0: How is there an accusation that is a legal issue arising from an accusation?
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:54.2_0: It’s when the monks accuse a monk of failure in morality, failure in conduct, failure in view, or failure in livelihood.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:54.3_0: In regard to this, whatever accusation, accusing, allegation, blame, taking sides because of friendship, taking part in the accusation, or supporting the accusation there is—
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:54.4_0: this is an accusation that is a legal issue arising from an accusation.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:55.1_0: How is there an accusation that is not a legal issue?
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:55.2_0: A mother accuses her child; a child their mother; a father his child; a child their father; a brother his brother; a sister; a sister her brother; a friend their friend—
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:55.3_0: this is an accusation that is not a legal issue.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:56.1_0: How is there a legal issue that is not an accusation?
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:56.2_0: A legal issue arising from an offense, a legal issue arising from business—
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:56.3_0: this is a legal issue that is not an accusation.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:57.1_0: How is there a legal issue that is also an accusation?
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:57.2_0: A legal issue arising from an accusation is a legal issue arising from an accusation.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:58.1_0: (4c) Are there offenses that are a legal issue arising from an offense? Are there offenses that are not a legal issue? Are there legal issues that are not an offense? Are there legal issues that are also an offense?
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:58.2_0: There may be offenses that are a legal issue arising from an offense; there may be offenses that are not a legal issue; there may be legal issues that are not an offense; there may be legal issues that are also an offense.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:59.1_0: How is there an offense that is a legal issue arising from an offense?
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:59.2_0: There is a legal issue arising from an offense because of the five classes of offenses;
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:59.3_0: (There is) a legal issue arising from an offense because of the seven classes of offenses.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:59.4_0: this is an offense that is a legal issue arising from an offense.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:60.1_0: How is there an offense that is not a legal issue?
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:60.3_0: this is an offense that is not a legal issue.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:61.1_0: How is there a legal issue that is not an offense?
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:61.2_0: A legal issue arising from business, a legal issue arising from a dispute, a legal issue arising from an accusation—
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:61.3_0: this is a legal issue that is not an offense.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:62.1_0: How is there a legal issue that is also an offense?
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:62.2_0: A legal issue arising from an offense is a legal issue and also an offense.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:63.1_0: (4d) Is there business that is a legal issue arising from business? Is there business that is not a legal issue? Are there legal issues that are not business? Are there legal issues that are also business?
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:63.2_0: There may be business that is a legal issue arising from business; there may be business that is not a legal issue; there may be legal issues that are not business; there may be legal issues that are also business.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:64.1_0: How is there business that is a legal issue arising from business?
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:64.2_0: Whatever is the duty or the business of the Sangha—a legal procedure consisting of getting permission, a legal procedure consisting of one motion, a legal procedure consisting of one motion and one announcement, a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements—
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:64.3_0: this is business that is a legal issue arising from business.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:65.1_0: How is there business that is not a legal issue?
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:65.2_0: The duty to teacher, the duty to a preceptor, the duty to a co-student, the duty to a co-pupil—
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:65.3_0: this is business that is not a legal issue.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:66.1_0: How is there a legal issue that is not business?
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:66.2_0: A legal issue arising from a dispute, a legal issue arising from an accusation, a legal issue arising from an offense—
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:66.3_0: this is a legal issue that is not business.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:67.1_0: How is there a legal issue that is also business?
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:67.2_0: A legal issue arising from business is a legal issue and also business.”
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:68.1_0: The group of legal issues is finished.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:70.1_0: A legal issue arising from an accusation,
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:71.1_0: and where there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:71.3_0: causes and reasons for these reasons.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:71.4_0: the current of the phrasing arose:
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:71.5_0: A legal issue is also a dispute.
ai-pli-tv-pvr11:71.6_0: When there is a legal issue
